snippet: Klaas-Jan Huntelaar scored twice to give Schalke a 4-3 victory at Real Madrid, but two headers by Cristiano Ronaldo meant that the hosts advanced on aggregate in the Champions League.
abstract: Schalke beats Real Madrid, 4-3, in Champions League play; Madrid nonetheless advances to quarterfinals on aggregate score of 5-4; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Klaas-Jan Huntelaar scored twice to give Schalke a 4-3 victory at Real Madrid, but two headers by Cristiano Ronaldo meant that the hosts advanced on aggregate in the Champions League.

headline.main: Ronaldo Lifts Real Madrid Into Quarterfinals
